BASIC
contract.wage
none
code
Basic
# Available variables: #---------------------- # payslip: object containing the payslips # employee: hr.employee object # contract: hr.contract object # rules: object containing the rules code (previously computed) # categories: object containing the computed salary rule categories (sum of amount of all rules belonging to that category). # worked_days: object containing the computed worked days # inputs: object containing the computed inputs
# Note: returned value have to be set in the variable 'result'
result = rules.NET > categories.NET * 0.10
result = 0.0 if worked_days and worked_days.TTLCURRWKDAYINMTH and worked_days.TTLCURCONTDAY: result = (contract.wage / worked_days.TTLCURRWKDAYINMTH.number_of_days) * worked_days.TTLCURCONTDAY.number_of_days
1.0

none code
Net
# Available variables: #---------------------- # payslip: object containing the payslips # employee: hr.employee object # contract: hr.contract object # rules: object containing the rules code (previously computed) # categories: object containing the computed salary rule categories (sum of amount of all rules belonging to that category). # worked_days: object containing the computed worked days # inputs: object containing the computed inputs
# Note: returned value have to be set in the variable 'result'
result = rules.NET > categories.NET * 0.10 result = categories.GROSS - categories.DED - categories.CAT_CPF_EMPLOYEE - categories. CATCPFAGENCYSERVICESEE

code
CPF - MBMF
# Available variables: #---------------------- # payslip: object containing the payslips # employee: hr.employee object # contract: hr.contract object # rules: object containing the rules code (previously computed) # categories: object containing the computed salary rule categories (sum of amount of all rules belonging to that category). # worked_days: object containing the computed worked days # inputs: object containing the computed inputs
# Note: returned value have to be set in the variable 'result'
result = rules.NET > categories.NET * 0.10 if categories.GROSS >= 4001: result = 16.00 elif categories.GROSS >= 3001 and categories.GROSS <= 4000: result = 12.50 elif categories.GROSS >= 2001 and categories.GROSS <= 3000: result = 5 elif categories.GROSS >= 1001 and categories.GROSS <= 2000: result = 3.50 elif categories.GROSS > 200 and categories.GROSS <= 1000: result = 2 else : result = 0
1.0

# Available variables: #---------------------- # payslip: object containing the payslips # employee: hr.employee object # contract: hr.contract object # rules: object containing the rules code (previously computed) # categories: object containing the computed salary rule categories (sum of amount of all rules belonging to that category). # worked_days: object containing the computed worked days # inputs: object containing the computed inputs
# Note: returned value have to be set in the variable 'result'
result = rules.NET > categories.NET * 0.10 if categories.GROSS >= 10000.01: result = 20 elif categories.GROSS >= 7000.01 and categories.GROSS <= 10000: result = 16 elif categories.GROSS >= 4000.01 and categories.GROSS <= 7000: result = 12 elif categories.GROSS >= 2500.01 and categories.GROSS <= 4000: result = 9 elif categories.GROSS >= 1500.01 and categories.GROSS <= 2500: result = 6 elif categories.GROSS >= 1000.01 and categories.GROSS <= 1500: result = 4 elif categories.GROSS >= 0 and categories.GROSS <= 1000: result = 2 else: result = 0
1.0
